segments.text: I notice the girl looking up at her brother, her expression full of eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sweet how she raises her hand, almost like a puppy begging for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look at the stool again, and my stomach tightens with worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One little tilt and he could come crashing down, and she would be right there beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake this feeling of impending doom as the water drips down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re having fun, but it’s all happening in a precarious moment that could turn sour.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at the woman to turn around and see the potential disaster brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
